typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		TotalCost as string,
		CreateDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer') ~> source1
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		Prop_1 as string,
		Prop_2 as string,
		Prop_3 as string,
		Prop_4 as string,
		Prop_5 as string,
		Prop_6 as string,
		Prop_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
